title: Advancing Post-Consumer Textile Recycling: Emerging Technologies Shaping Sustainable Fashion - Fibre2fashion.com
summary: The textile industry is facing a growing environmental crisis due to massive textile waste, with only a small fraction being recycled. New recycling technologies, both mechanical and chemical, are emerging to address this challenge. These innovations aim to improve the quality of recycled materials and create a more sustainable circular economy for textiles.
